spatial_accuracy.notes: General layout is preserved, but door swings and certain wall lengths deviate from the CAD specifications. Window placement in Bed-2 appears compressed compared to the 2D plan.

structural_fidelity.notes: The utility area partition and the connection to the kitchen show slight geometry merging. The foyer entrance wall thickness is inconsistent with the internal bedroom walls.

furniture_mapping.notes: Furniture placement aligns well with the plan, though the dining table chairs and the orientation of the living room rug have slight scale and position shifts.

aesthetic_quality.notes: High-quality isometric perspective and realistic materials. Lighting is consistent, and the shadows add depth without obscuring structural details.

detected_errors.description: Living room sofa is shifted slightly closer toward the center of the room compared to the rug in the floor plan.
The foyer/entry door swing is improperly represented as a semi-transparent arc that does to align with standard architectural swing symbols.
Proportions of the 'Utility' wall segments appear thinner than the primary load-bearing exterior walls shown in the 2D plan.
Glass partitions in the bathrooms exhibit slight clipping and lack clear framing details found in the original schematic.
